ygData.subject: Re: EQ  Xegony
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello again!         December 8th Good news for me!  The person that was going to buy my account backed out so I can keep my old account on xegony .. If anyone
ygData.messageBody:
Hello again! December 8th

Good news for me! The person that was going to buy my
account backed out so I can keep my old account on
xegony ..

If anyone on this list is on xegony and wants to
group, my characters are:
Gaelad 50 DE enchanter
Cenen 27 human necro
Leafe 18 WE druid
Gooeypoo 1 Ogre shaman :)

of course that means I can also pick back up on rodcet
with my character there :)


--- J Dye <gaelad@...> wrote:
>
> Well.. it's December 6th and the list has been
> pretty
> quiet. =) Here's what's up with me...
>
> I sold my account (Gaelad on Xegony) since I didn't
> think I was going to be able to play after my hand
> surgery (and after losing interest in the game), but
> my hand is better so I am starting over. I was just
> curious of what servers had the most of "us" that
> gets
> this list--and is there anyone on Xegony?? =)
>
> the enchanter formerly known as Gaelad
